TestDescription.name: SFTP/FTP credentials exposure
TestDescription.Description:
A file containing SFTP/FTP connection credentials was found on this web server. [break][break]
Some SFTP/FTP clients store SFTP/FTP connection details such as hostname, username, password in text files. For example Sublime SFTP is creating a file named [bold]sftp-config.json[/bold], FileZilla is storing the information in a file named [bold]recentservers.xml[/bold].
TestDescription.Impact: An attacker will be able to see your FTP/SFTP user and password.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Remove this file from the web server.
